# Insurance â€“ Claims Rules

## Claim Principles
- Claims must reference a valid policy.
- Claims must align with policy coverage and timing.
- Claim decisions must be auditable and explainable.

## Processing Rules
- Claim submission must be explicit.
- Claim adjudication must follow defined stages.
- Claim outcomes must be final and traceable.

## Forbidden
- Claim processing without policy validation
- Silent claim approval or rejection
- Retroactive claim modification
